author: Mike Masnick
description: Ctrl-Alt-Speech is a weekly podcast about the latest news in online speech, from Mike Masnick and Everything in Moderation‘s Ben Whitelaw. Subscribe now on Apple Podcasts, Overcast, Spotify, Pocket Casts, YouTube, or your podcast app of choice — or go straight to the RSS feed. In this week’s round-up of the latest news in online […]
title: Ctrl-Alt-Speech: Chat Bot Your Tongue?

author: Tim Cushing
description: Going forward, the only thing you’ll hear reported from the Pentagon will be delivered by subservient, right-wing stenographers. The War Department has its own Ministry of Truth, staffed by people whose organizations have seen their fortunes rise along with Trump’s. The bootlicking was always there. The only change is that it’s now officially state-sanctioned. The […]
title: Pentagon Proudly Announces Its New Stable Of Propagandists

author: Alex Beattie
description: A wave of proposed social media bans for young people has swept the globe recently, fuelled by mounting concern about the apparent harm the likes of TikTok, Instagram and Snapchat can cause to vulnerable minds. Australia was the first to announce restrictions on people under 16 having a social media account. New Zealand may soon follow, and Denmark’s […]
title: As Social Media Restrictions Spread, Is The Internet Entering Its Victorian Era?

author: Mike Masnick
description: A couple weeks ago, as hundreds of thousands of Americans took to the streets in what may have been the largest single day of protest in U.S. history, the President of the United States responded by… posting a video of himself literally dumping shit on citizens. Not a policy response. Not an attempt at dialogue. […]
title: Trump’s Government Of Spite: Political Performance Art For Assholes

author: Daily Deal
description: The 2025 AI Super Skills Bundle has 8 courses to help you get familiar with how to use some of the latest and coolest artificial intelligence tools out there. Courses cover ChatGPT, DALL-E 3, Leonardo AI, Quillbot, and more. It’s on sale for $30. Note: The Techdirt Deals Store is powered and curated by StackCommerce. […]
title: Daily Deal: The 2025 AI Super Skills Bundle

author: Tim Cushing
description: Like far too many people in the Trump administration — including the 79-year-old child currently sitting in the Oval Office — Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth thinks he’s owed respect simply because of the position he holds. While a certain amount of deference is expected when you’re the boss, it’s much more difficult to earn […]
title: Pete Hegseth May Be The Defense Department Boss, But Top Officers Say He’s No Leader

author: Karl Bode
description: As promised, the Trump FCC under Brendan Carr this week voted to begin dismantling rules requiring that your ISP offer clear and transparent details on the cost and limitations of your broadband connection. The rules, originally mandated by Congress as part of the infrastructure bill, required that ISPs affix a sort of “nutrition label” to […]
title: Trump FCC Votes To Make It Easier For Your Broadband ISP To Rip You Off

author: Timothy Geigner
description: It’s sort of funny in a way to see how ownership culture has specifically invaded the realm of the culinary arts. If ever there was a place for cultural fusion and an openness culture, it surely should be in cooking. And, yet, we have seen many instances of businesses and/or people attempting to trademark generic […]
title: UK Woman Threatens Trademark Legal Action Against Cookbook Over ‘Sabzi’
